channel.title: CVE Feed for hikashop.com -- HikaShop component for Joomla
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hikashop.com -- HikaShop component for Joomla

item.title: CVE-2024-40746|2024-10-21T16:46:05.894Z -- hikashop.com -- hikashop%20component%20for%20joomla
item.description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in HikaShop Joomla Component < 5.1.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript in the web browser of a user, by including a malicious payload in the `description` parameter of any product. The `description `parameter is not sanitised in the backend.
